entry.title: [SBG][Network] - Backbone incident notification
entry.content:
Dec 4, 16:10 UTC
Resolved - Since 13:47 UTC, no more perturbation is observed.

Start time : 03/12/2024 10:31 UTC
End time : 04/12/2024 13:47 UTC
Root cause : fiber cut

No more intervention is needed from the provider.
The configuration for the few isolated services have been reverted to its state prior the event and is operational.

The incident is now fully resolved.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Dec 4, 14:36 UTC
Update - Our provider just completed the intervention.
Our technical teams is now working on restoring the impacted services to definitively resolved the incident.

Dec 3, 19:32 UTC
Update - A fix for the isolation has been deployed. Impacted services are reachable anew.
The fiber cut is not yet repaired but our provider is working on it.

Service impact : You might observed additional latency going through SBG Backbone.

As always, we will keep you informed of further developments and the definitive resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Dec 3, 17:21 UTC
Update - Our provider is working on resolving the fiber cut issue.
Our technical teams are working on re-routing some of our network to resolved the unreachability issue that impacted some clients.

We will keep you updated as soon as significant progress is made.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Dec 3, 16:00 UTC
Update - A fiber cut has been detected ahead of SBG datacenter.
Only a few clients are impacted by an interconnection unreachability issue that has been identified.
Additional latency is observed going through the backbone.

Our technical teams are working on resolving this incident.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Dec 3, 13:00 UTC
Update - Service impact : Disconnection / latency is being observed on the Backbone of Strasbourg.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are fully mobilized and actively working to resolve this problem.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Dec 3, 11:13 UTC
Identified - An incident is in progress on our Backbone infrastructure.

Please be aware that this is currently affecting the latency.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 03/12/2024 10:31 UTC
Service impact : Latency is being observed on the Backbone of Strasbourg
Root cause : A fiber cut caused the issue.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are fully mobilized and actively working to resolve this problem.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [LIM][Infrastructre] - Multiple servers unavailable
entry.content:
Dec 4, 00:53 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 03/12/2024 06:01 UTC
End Time : 04/12/2024 00:32 UTC
Service impact :We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal. All the servers are now operational.
Root cause : An operation on multiple network equipment caused the incident.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Dec 3, 11:59 UTC
Update - Start time : 03/12/2024 06:01 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in Limburg were temporarily unavailable till 06:15 UTC.
Root cause : An operation on multiple network equipment caused the incident.
Ongoing actions : A maintenance has been scheduled to get back to nominal state.
Related maintenance: Maintenance link

Dec 3, 07:03 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 03/12/2024 06:01 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in Limburg were temporarily unavailable till 06:15 UTC.
Root cause : An operation on multiple network equipment caused the incident.
Ongoing actions : Our teams isolated the equipment that caused the incident.
The situation is stable and a maintenance will be implemented tonight to get back to nominal state.
We will inform you of the operation's schedule when we have more information.

Thank you for your understanding.

Dec 3, 06:34 UTC
Identified - Start time : 03/12/2024 06:01 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in Limburg were temporarily unavailable till 06:15 UTC.
Root cause : An operation on multiple network equipment caused the incident.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently doing a rollback to the operation.
